name: Sweet Madame
des:
Heal the target character for 1 HP.
(A character can consume at most 1 Food per Round)

name: Mondstadt Hash Brown
des:
Heal the target character for 2 HP.
(A character can consume at most 1 Food per Round)

name: Jueyun Guoba
des:
During this Round, the target character's next Normal Attack deals +1 DMG.
(A character can consume at most 1 Food per Round)

name: Adeptus' Temptation
des:
During this Round, the target character's next Elemental Burst deals +3 DMG.
(A character can consume at most 1 Food per Round)

name: Lotus Flower Crisp
des:
During this Round, the target character takes -3 DMG the next time.
(A character can consume at most 1 Food per Round)

name: Northern Smoked Chicken
des:
During this Round, the target character's next Normal Attack costs 1 less Unaligned Element.
(A character can consume at most 1 Food per Round)

name: Mushroom Pizza
des:
Heal the target character for 1 HP. For the next two Rounds, heal this character for 1 HP again at the End Phase.
(A character can consume at most 1 Food per Round)

name: Minty Meat Rolls
des:
Before this Round ends, the target character's Normal Attacks cost 1 less Unaligned Element.
(A character can consume at most 1 Food per Round)

name: Elemental Resonance: Woven Ice
des:
Create 1 Cryo Die.
(You must have at least 2 Cryo characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

name: Elemental Resonance: Shattering Ice
des:
During this Round, your current active character will deal +2 DMG for the next instance.
(You must have at least 2 Cryo characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

name: Elemental Resonance: Woven Waters
des:
Create 1 Hydro Die.
(You must have at least 2 Hydro characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

name: Elemental Resonance: Soothing Water
des:
Heal your active character for 2 HP and all your characters on standby for 1 HP.
(You must have at least 2 Hydro characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

name: Elemental Resonance: Woven Flames
des:
Create 1 Pyro Die.
(You must have at least 2 Pyro characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

name: Elemental Resonance: Fervent Flames
des:
During this round, the next instance of Pyro-Related Reactions your current active character triggers deals +3 DMG.
(You must have at least 2 Pyro characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

name: Elemental Resonance: Woven Thunder
des:
Create 1 Electro Die.
(You must have at least 2 Electro characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

name: Elemental Resonance: High Resonance
des:
One of your characters without maximum Energy gains 1 Energy. (Active Character prioritized)
(You must have at least 2 Electro characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

name: Elemental Resonance: Woven Winds
des:
Create 1 Anemo Die.
(You must have at least 2 Anemo characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

name: Elemental Resonance: Impetuous Winds
des:
Switch to the target character and create Omni Element Die.
(You must have at least 2 Anemo characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

name: Elemental Resonance: Woven Stone
des:
Create 1 Geo Die.
(You must have at least 2 Geo characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

name: Elemental Resonance: Woven Weeds
des:
Create 1 Dendro Die.
(You must have at least 2 Dendro characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

name: The Bestest Travel Companion!
des: Convert the Elemental Dice spent to Omni Element Die.

name: Changing Shifts
des: The next time you perform "Switch Character": Spend 1 less Elemental Die.

name: Strategize
des: Draw 2 cards.

name: I Haven't Lost Yet!
des:
Only playable if one of your characters is defeated this Round:
Create Omni Element Die and your current active character gains 1 Energy.

name: Leave It to Me!
des: The next time you perform "Switch Character": This switch will be considered a Fast Action instead of a Combat Action.

name: Starsigns
des: Your current Active Character gains 1 Energy.

name: Calx's Arts
des: Shift 1 Energy from at most 2 of your characters on standby to your active character.

name: When the Crane Returned
des: The next time you use a Skill: Switch your next character in to be the active character.

name: Quick Knit
des: Choose one Summon on your side and grant it +1 Usage(s).

name: Send Off
des: Choose one Summon on the opposing side and destroy it.

name: Guardian's Oath
des: Destroy all Summons. (Affects both you and your opponent!)

name: Flowing Flame
des:
Combat Action:  When your active character is Diluc, equip this card.
After Diluc equips this card, immediately use Searing Onslaught once.
When your Diluc, who has this card equipped, uses Searing Onslaught for the second time in one Round, spend 1 less Pyro Die.
(You must have Diluc in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

name: Chaotic Entropy
des:
Combat Action:  When your active character is Sucrose, equip this card.
After Sucrose equips this card, immediately use Forbidden Creation - Isomer 75 / Type II once.
After the Large Wind Spirit created by your Sucrose, who had this card equipped, has converted to another Elemental Type: Deal +1 DMG of this Elemental Type.
(You must have Sucrose in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

name: Cold-Blooded Strike
des:
Combat Action:  When your active character is Kaeya, equip this card.
After Kaeya equips this card, immediately use Frostgnaw once.
After your Kaeya, who has this card equipped, uses Frostgnaw, he heals himself for 2 HP. (Once per Round)
(You must have Kaeya in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

name: Stellar Predator
des:
Combat Action:  When your active character is Fischl, equip this card.
After Fischl equips this card, immediately use Nightrider once.
When your Fischl, who has this card equipped, creates an Oz, and after Fischl uses a Normal Attack: Deal 2 Electro DMG. (Consumes Usage(s))
(You must have Fischl in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

name: Magic Guide
des:
The character deals +1 DMG.
(Only Catalyst Characters can equip this. A character can equip a maximum of 1 Weapon)

name: Liyue Harbor Wharf
des:
End Phase: Draw 2 cards.
Usage(s): 2

name: Knights of Favonius Library
des:
When played: Select any Elemental Dice to reroll.
Roll Phase: Gain another chance to reroll.

name: Jade Chamber
des: Roll Phase: 2 of the starting Elemental Dice you roll are always guaranteed to match the Elemental Type of your active character.

name: Dawn Winery
des: When you perform "Switch Character": Spend 1 less Elemental Die. (Once per Round)

name: Wangshu Inn
des:
End Phase: Heal the most injured character on standby for 2 HP.
Usage(s): 2

name: Favonius Cathedral
des:
End Phase: Heal your active character for 2 HP.
Usage(s): 2

name: Paimon
des:
When Action Phase begins: Create Two Omni Element Dices.
Usage(s): 2

name: Katheryne
des: When you perform "Switch Character": This switch is considered a Fast Action instead of a Combat Action. (Once per Round)

name: Timaeus
des:
Comes with 2 Transmutation Materials when played.
End Phase: Gain 1 Transmutation Material.
When playing an Artifact Card: If possible, spend Transmutation Materials equal to the total cost of the Artifact and equip this Artifact for free. (Once per Round)

name: Wagner
des:
Comes with 2 Forging Billets when played.
End Phase: Gain 1 Forging Billet.
When playing a Weapon Card: If possible, spend Forging Billets equal to the total cost of the Weapon and equip this Weapon for free. (Once per Round)

name: Chef Mao
des: After playing a Food Event Card: Create 1 random Elemental Die. (Once per Round)

name: Tubby
des: When playing a Location Support Card: Spend 2 less Elemental Dice. (Once per Round)

name: Timmie
des:
Triggers automatically once per Round: This card gains 1 Pigeon.
When this card gains 3 Pigeons, discard this card, then draw 1 card and create Omni Element ×1.

name: Liben
des:
End Phase: Collect your unused Elemental Dice (Max 1 of each Elemental Type).
When Action Phase begins: If this card has collected 3 Elemental Dice, draw 2 cards and create Omni Element Die, then discard this card.

name: Chang the Ninth
des:
When either side uses a Skill: If Physical DMG or Piercing DMG was dealt, or an Elemental Reaction was triggered, this card gains 1 Inspiration.
When this card gains 3 Inspiration, discard this card, then draw 2 cards.

name: Ellin
des: When you use a Skill that has already been used in this Round: Spend 1 less Elemental Die. (Once per Round)

name: Iron Tongue Tian
des:
End Phase: One of your characters without maximum Energy gains 1 Energy. (Active Character prioritized)
Usage(s): 2

name: Liu Su
des:
After you switch characters: If the character you switched to does not have Energy, they will gain 1 Energy. (Once per Round)
Usage(s):

name: Parametric Transformer
des:
When either side uses a Skill: If Elemental DMG was dealt, this card gains 1 Qualitative Progress.
When this card gains 3 Qualitative Progress, discard this card, then create 3 different Basic Elemental Dice.

name: NRE
des:
When played: Draw 1 Food Event Card from your deck.
When you play a Food Event Card: Draw 1 Food Event Card from your deck. (Once per Round)

name: Toss-Up
des: Select any Elemental Die to reroll. Can reroll 2 times.

name: Master of Weaponry
des: Shift 1 Weapon Equipment Card that has been equipped to one of your characters to another one of your characters of the same Weapon Type.

name: Blessing of the Divine Relic's Installation
des: Shift 1 Artifact Equipment Card that has been equipped to one of your characters to another one of your characters.

name: Abysssal Summons
des:
Summon 1 Random Hilichurl Summon!
(You must have at least 2 Monster characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
